name: Ghosts #1
description: @garethwild | A series of images taken in servants wing of a Jacobean mansion in the South of England. Multiple exposures of a digital graphic projected onto window shutters. The images are part of a wider photographic essay published as a 28pg book ‘Apropos-Everybody’. The work was included in ‘Interact:1’  an exhibition of new media experimentation - a Playstation sponsored show held at the London College of Communication as part of the 2005 London Design Festival. Size: 1080 x 1600 px
